sentence: The ______ will perform a symphony at the concert hall tonight.
sentence_translation: 管弦乐队今晚将在音乐厅演奏一首交响曲。

sentence: She is an ______ girl who solves math problems quickly.
sentence_translation: 她是一个聪明的女孩，能快速解决数学问题。

sentence: The weather this summer has been ______ hot and dry.
sentence_translation: 今年夏天的天气异常炎热干燥。

sentence: We bought tickets to the ______ featuring a famous pianist.
sentence_translation: 我们买了有著名钢琴家参演的音乐会门票。

sentence: He enjoys listening to ______ music by composers like Beethoven.
sentence_translation: 他喜欢听贝多芬等作曲家的古典音乐。

sentence: Her ______ job was in a bookstore before she became a teacher.
sentence_translation: 在成为教师之前，她之前的工作是在一家书店。

sentence: I can't ______ the name of the movie we watched last week.
sentence_translation: 我想不起我们上周看的那部电影的名字了。

sentence: The ______ storm caused widespread damage to the village.
sentence_translation: 这场毁灭性的暴风雨对村庄造成了广泛破坏。

sentence: Scientists plan to ______ the deep ocean to find new species.
sentence_translation: 科学家们计划探索深海以发现新物种。

sentence: The ______ of the documentary has a clear and pleasant voice.
sentence_translation: 这部纪录片的旁白者有着清晰悦耳的声音。

sentence: From a child's ______, the world is full of wonders.
sentence_translation: 从孩子的视角来看，世界充满了奇迹。

sentence: The ______ will give a lecture on environmental science tomorrow.
sentence_translation: 这位教授明天将做一场关于环境科学的讲座。

sentence: Long-term stress can have ______ effects on a person's health.
sentence_translation: 长期压力会对人的健康产生心理上的影响。

sentence: The ______ helped her deal with her anxiety through counseling.
sentence_translation: 这位心理学家通过心理咨询帮助她缓解焦虑。

sentence: She is studying ______ to understand how the human mind works.
sentence_translation: 她正在学习心理学，以了解人类的思维方式。

sentence: Working together, we can ______ this problem more efficiently.
sentence_translation: 齐心协力，我们能更高效地解决这个问题。

sentence: Einstein's ______ of relativity changed the way we understand the universe.
sentence_translation: 爱因斯坦的相对论改变了我们对宇宙的理解方式。

sentence: He felt a sudden ______ to travel and see the world.
sentence_translation: 他突然有了旅行看世界的冲动。

sentence: Over time, his ______ on coffee became stronger.
sentence_translation: 随着时间的推移，他对咖啡的依赖变得更强了。

sentence: The novel tells a ______ story of dragons and magic kingdoms.
sentence_translation: 这部小说讲述了一个关于龙和魔法王国的幻想故事。

sentence: Edison was able to ______ many useful devices during his lifetime.
sentence_translation: 爱迪生一生中发明了许多有用的装置。

sentence: The ______ of the clock ensures it keeps accurate time.
sentence_translation: 钟表的机制确保它能准确计时。

sentence: The ______ of water from ice to vapor skips the liquid stage.
sentence_translation: 水从冰直接升华为蒸汽跳过了液态阶段。

sentence: She ______ tapped her foot to the rhythm of the music.
sentence_translation: 她无意识地随着音乐的节奏轻拍脚。

sentence: They decided to ______ the river to prevent flooding in the town.
sentence_translation: 他们决定使河流改道以防止城镇洪水。

sentence: Washing hands regularly can ______ the spread of germs.
sentence_translation: 经常洗手可以防止细菌传播。

sentence: Security officers ______ the entrance to the building 24 hours a day.
sentence_translation: 保安人员全天24小时守卫大楼入口。

sentence: ______, the store closes at 9 p.m. on weekdays.
sentence_translation: 通常情况下，这家商店在工作日晚上9点关门。

sentence: The child's good ______ was praised by the teacher.
sentence_translation: 这个孩子的良好行为受到了老师的表扬。

sentence: Workers will ______ a new bridge over the river next year.
sentence_translation: 工人们明年将在河上建造一座新桥。

sentence: Her actions were not ______ with her promises.
sentence_translation: 她的行为与她的承诺不一致。

sentence: Each ______ is responsible for their own decisions.
sentence_translation: 每个成年人都要对自己的决定负责。

sentence: She felt ______ before her first job interview.
sentence_translation: 第一次求职面试前，她感到很焦虑。

sentence: Regular exercise has many ______ for physical health.
sentence_translation: 有规律的锻炼对身体健康有很多好处。

sentence: A fallen tree ______ the road, so we had to find another way.
sentence_translation: 一棵倒下的树挡住了路，所以我们不得不另找一条路。

sentence: Colds are ______ in winter when people stay indoors more.
sentence_translation: 冬天人们更多待在室内，感冒很常见。

sentence: The ______ noise from the construction site disturbed the neighbors.
sentence_translation: 建筑工地持续不断的噪音打扰了邻居。

sentence: Everyone can ______ to protecting the environment in small ways.
sentence_translation: 每个人都能以小行动为保护环境做贡献。

sentence: The ______ cat explored every corner of the new house.
sentence_translation: 这只好奇的猫探索了新房子的每个角落。

sentence: His ______ to learn drove him to study day and night.
sentence_translation: 他对学习的渴望驱使他日夜苦读。

sentence: The ______ of new technologies has changed our daily lives.
sentence_translation: 新技术的发展改变了我们的日常生活。

sentence: Moving to a new city made her ______ vulnerable for a while.
sentence_translation: 搬到新城市让她在情感上脆弱了一段时间。

sentence: The ancient ______ stands tall in the center of the city.
sentence_translation: 这座古老的塔高耸在城市中心。

sentence: Too much sugar can ______ your teeth over time.
sentence_translation: 长期来看，过多的糖会伤害你的牙齿。

sentence: The dove ______ peace in many cultures around the world.
sentence_translation: 在世界许多文化中，鸽子象征着和平。

sentence: He accidentally ______ the vase when he bumped into the table.
sentence_translation: 他撞到桌子时不小心打碎了花瓶。

sentence: She felt ______ about walking alone in the dark alley.
sentence_translation: 在黑暗的小巷里独自行走，她感到不安。

sentence: We always ______ ______ at the beach during summer vacations.
sentence_translation: 暑假期间，我们在海滩总是玩得很开心。

sentence: Plants ______ ______ sunlight and water to grow.
sentence_translation: 植物依赖阳光和水生长。

sentence: With practice, you will ______ ______ ______ speak English fluently.
sentence_translation: 通过练习，你将能够流利地说英语。

sentence: ______ ______ the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.
sentence_translation: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。

sentence: Helping others gives her ______ ______ ______ satisfaction.
sentence_translation: 帮助他人给她一种满足感。

sentence: Staying calm helps you ______ ______ ______ in difficult situations.
sentence_translation: 保持冷静能帮助你在困境中掌控局面。

sentence: Eating a balanced diet can ______ ______ better health.
sentence_translation: 均衡饮食有助于身体健康。

sentence: It's important to ______ ______ good advice when you receive it.
sentence_translation: 收到好建议时，采取行动很重要。

sentence: He tried to cook but ______ ______ the recipe completely.
sentence_translation: 他试着做饭，却把食谱完全搞砸了。

sentence: She ______ ______ ______ her brother for breaking her favorite toy.
sentence_translation: 她因为哥哥弄坏了她最喜欢的玩具而感到沮丧。

sentence: Children under 12 are not ______ ______ ______ ride the roller coaster.
sentence_translation: 12岁以下的儿童不被允许乘坐过山车。

sentence: The report includes all the ______ ______ the project plan.
sentence_translation: 这份报告包含了项目计划的所有细节。

sentence: Living in the city is convenient. ______ ______ ______ ______, it's more expensive.
sentence_translation: 住在城市很方便，另一方面，开销更大。

sentence: ______ ______ we leave at 8 a.m. – we'll arrive by noon.
sentence_translation: 比方说我们早上8点出发——我们会在中午前到达。

sentence: This new model ______ ______ ______ the old one in many ways.
sentence_translation: 这款新型号在很多方面与旧型号不同。

sentence: Sunscreen helps ______ your skin ______ harmful UV rays.
sentence_translation: 防晒霜有助于保护皮肤免受有害紫外线的伤害。

sentence: She chose to walk ______ ______ taking the bus.
sentence_translation: 她选择步行而不是乘公交车。

sentence: We need to ______ children ______ dangerous chemicals.
sentence_translation: 我们需要让孩子们远离危险化学品。
